remarks: Transfer a reflexive law to the function relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caofref.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofref.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
caofref.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> x R x ) $.
caofref $p |- ( ph -> F oR R F ) $.
$d F x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
